column4: Hey guys, I just upgraded to Ubuntu 12.04 and it would appear NS lookups are failing now...it can't find google.com but if I type the ip address manually it can ping just fine
anyone know what would cause that?
did you ever manually edit resolv.conf?
just checked it and it's empty
OK, and are you using DHCP or static IP?
you edited /etc/network/interfaces to get that static IP?
do you know the IP address of the DNS server you want to use?
restart networking before testing the changes.
that seems to have fixed it
